wikipedia_page.main: Jake Ball (born 21 June 1991 in Ascot, England) is a Wales international rugby union player. He last played for the Scarlets as a lock forward.

response: James King, Ospreys and Wales backrow replaced Ken Owens as Chairman of the WRPA after a successful 5 years in term. James will Chair the Executive Committee of Jake Ball, Steff Hughes, Dan Lydiate, Lewis Evans, Tyler Morgan, Josh Turnbull and Ellis Jenkins who represent the voices of all players in relation to issues in the game.
